Reviews.Title: Apparently sold a used iPhone... not NEW
Reviews.Author: Windsurfer "Skimmer"
Reviews.Content: Problem:This phone was sold as NEW and unlocked and we received it promptly after the Sept. 13th order fulfillment.On Oct 24th, the Phone failed completely.  It would not re-start with soft and hard reset.  It continued to be locked up completely with unresponsive touch on a fully energized main screen (the first "unlock" display present and waiting).  The unit was taken to a local Apple Store (while we were traveling, Tampa Florida) and the Apple service agent checked the Apple database to discover that the unit was out of their one year warranty period by about 2 months.This phone also exhibited minor problems in use:  Screen colors were tinted slightly orange; Apple locator on Google Maps had trouble locating the unit.  We were willing to "pass" on these performance issues, but not now with a "dead" locked phone.  When we took this phone to the Apple store, the technician also noted that the red water damage indicator had gone off.  In the 6 weeks we had the phone, it was never in more water than the ambient humidity which further suggests to us that the "new" phone we purchased was indeed a used unit. The Apple Technicians will not go any further with service at this time.  We have a dead unit.Request:A request for a refund in full has been made, via Amazon communications to the company (The OEM Planet) or possibly a replacement unit.  Our problem is that they have simply sent a "boiler plate" return form, but the form clearly states a 30 day return policy.... there is no mention of what they will actually honor beyond the 30 day period (our case), and so we are presently stuck.  We don't seem to have a true email address by which to continue a dialog with this company.In summary: we were sold a supposedly NEW iPhone 3GS, but all internal appearances are that this phone was never really NEW, but rather an used phone albeit with excellent outward appearance.If Amazon or The OEM Planet wishes to they can reference communications:The OEM Planet - Amazon Marketplace  [...]

Reviews.Title: not the best
Reviews.Author: T. Hartmannsson
Reviews.Content: I had two issues after receiving the iphone, one the center or home button was hard to push, after only one day of use - the screen displayed the itunes logo and a usb cable, i tried turning on/off several times and tried reloading thru itunes-failed due to iphone being unlock, this according to vendor i purchased the phone from.  The vendor seemd kind and concerned about addressing my two issues, so I sent back the iphone for him to fix at my own expense, he reloaded software and stated in a letter I got with the repaired phone to NEVER update your iphone on itunes, and as far as the center button or home key, the vendor stated it seems to be ok, thus,  no it  was not fixed, so after spending several hundred dollars for this used iphone that was advertised as in great shape,was in my opinion not, buyer beware- software is one big issue with unlocked phones and performance or buttons are another, I used the iphone for another week and got a pineapple on the screen, so long story short, I ended up just buying buying a iphone thru Apple store.

I called Apple and gave them the serial number.  Apple advised me the phone was NOT NEW (as stated on the web page) and the warranty had expired some time ago.  They sold it to a company in europe March 19, 2003.  Further APPLE stated they NEVER sold ANY UNLOCKED iPhones prior to the iPhone 4 and had NOT unlocked this phone (as stated on the web page).

Reviews.Title: Excellent Phone (Updated)
Reviews.Author: E E
Reviews.Content: I bought my unlocked iphone3gs from Apple for $375. It came with charger, Usb, and earphones. It is SO easy to use.I can use it as a regular phone or a smartphone. I have no problems with it at all. It's the first smartphone I've owned and  I'm delighted with it's ease of use.I'd recommend Apple's unlocked iPhone3GS for those who do not want an expensive monthly data plan and also for those who travel. It's simple to swap out the simcard. Added bonus, it comes with the new ios5!Update, two years down the road and my iPhone3gs is still going strong. It automatically gets any new software updates and I've never had any problems with my phone. I live it because it has some structure and weight to it. I do not like these new thinner and lightweight iphones. I'm going to keep using my iP3gs for as long as it will last.Side-note: some techy compared all the iPhone models out there from the earliest to the latest and the ip3gs was just a smidg slower at booting-up/loading/shutting down than the iPhone5. It fared better than all the others!

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Iphone worth the $$??
Reviews.Author: Marcia S. Anglarill "worldshopper"
Reviews.Content: I bought an unlocked refurbished Iphone because I will be using it overseas and I wanted something almost as good as new but without the pricetage.  For the most part, this phone has worked well but has a slightly faulty SIM chip insert.  At times I will get a no SIM card installed reading.  This usually corrects itself, but it is annoying because it has led to some missed calls and if I ever needed to make a call urgently and ran in to this problem, then it really would be a problem!Bottom line, you're probably better off going with a new phone.  If you want to save some money and are prepared for a truly used product, then better to go with a used phone vice a refurbished one, which is still pretty pricey.

Reviews.Title: BEWARE!  ‘Bytes of Deals’ & their other FRONT company ‘iCellPhones’
Reviews.Author: zdlat
Reviews.Content: These items were advertised on AMAZON as NEW. Before buying these 2 items, I contacted the selling company 'Bytes of Deals' to ask whether they were in fact BRAND NEW, as in unopened & in original packaging from Apple & whether they would have the original 1 year Apple warranty. The company assured me that they were absolutely new, unopened, never used & in original Apple packaging & would indeed have the 1 year Apple warranty. To assuage my doubts this company offered to provide me with two new Applecare 2-year extended warranties. Based on this information we purchased these two Apple iPhone 3G’s. After receiving the products I had to immediately travel overseas where I am now located (Germany).Today I tried to register the iPhones via the Apple website but the automated information given there - based on the Serial # ID’s from the phones - explained that these phones had been PURCHASED in 2009. I then called Apple & tried to register the iPhones for their supposed original 1 year Apple warranty. However the Apple representative explained exactly what their website said which was;1. the phones HAD been purchased in 2009 & NOT by a wholesale reselling company (like Walmart) but by PRIVATE individuals.2. Apple would NOT honor the original 1 year warranty and,3. that even the two Applecare 2-year extended warranties were valueless & could not be honored or registered.This company ‘Bytes of Deals’ and their other FRONT company called ‘iCellPhones’ ] is selling through Amazon website and is telling OUTRIGHT LIES via Amazon. This is an outrage and AMAZON is responsible for permitting false advertising & lies on their website. I will expect that Amazon (or Bytes of Deals) will pay for the international return shipping for these products.I would suggest that you BUY 10 "new" iPhones from either of these charlatans and then return them for the same reasons. May be they will get the hint & start being honest. I doubt it.

Reviews.Title: iPhone 3G is NOT compatible with latest software
Reviews.Author: Allison
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed with the iPhone 3 I purchased.  I tried downloading applications such as skype, facebook, what's app, etc. only to find out that the latest software the phone is compatible with is iOS 4.2.1.  All the apps require at least iOS 4.3 or later which makes this phone a complete waste of money.  I live outside of the U.S. and the only reason I bought this phone was to be able to have access to iphone applications through wifi.  I used an android phone before and had no idea of this software update issue with old iphones.  If anyone knows of any solutions to this problem I would like to know.

Reviews.Title: For overseas buyers-  what to be careful about
Reviews.Author: Ab
Reviews.Content: We are Americans living in Europe so we needed an unlocked IPhone.  The prices in the European country where we reside for an IPhone are double compared to the US.  I wanted to buy this for my husband for his birthday.  I had it shipped to my parents in the US and it arrived just fine with the recharger & USB line, earphones with microphone, etc.  It was packaged very well.  But if you also need an IPhone to use outside of the US, here is one thing you MUST be careful about.  When you hook the phone up to your PC to activate it, do NOT click on the option to upgrade or change the existing settings.  If you do this, you completely mess up your phone and you will need to take it to a computer specialist or Apple store to restore the settings.  This happened to us.  But the computer specialist in our neighborhood fixed it right away and my husband has been using it for over a week without problems using the SIM card from his older cellphone from our European provider.  He has downloaded his music in ITunes without problems and makes calls and sends SMS without problems.  So everything is fine now.

It is impossible to return things from such a distance and I did not try it out before leaving the states because it was a gift.  I am not sure about other countries, but in Ecuador the government is doing what it can to keep phones from being brought in.  I don't know if this phone was blocked or just defective, but bringing in Iphones to this country is iffy at best.

Reviews.Title: nightmare and un-satisfaction
Reviews.Author: R.J.Y.
Reviews.Content: Dear Sirs: I don't know how to express my nightmare and un-satisfaction with the purchase of the iPhone, I bought it for my daughter who lives outside the United States and this is what I got:1-when charging the battery the charge goes up and them back and back until it turns of for lack of battery, so I have to restart it to be able to see the real battery chargethat that by the way if it says 100% full charge and a couple of minutes later goes down to 80% and them within 2 hours without use goes out of battery2-the bottom part of the scream does not work, when you try putting the password you can't due it because the tactile part of the bottom screen does not work.3-when answering a call with the volume at maximum volume you can barely hear the other person.In my opinion the product is a total failure, I have thrown my money to waste, may daughter so disappointed with the gift I gave her, and will NEVER NEVER again buy any electronic Item from this vendor or any vendor through AMAZON.COM, my recommendation ZERO "0"  is a piece of junk.Sincerely yoursRamon J. Yepez

Reviews.Title: Jail brake
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Hi when i tried to update my new phone, Apple gave an error 1015 on this phone that it was jail brake an locked the phone.

Reviews.Title: never worked!!!!
Reviews.Author: Sandi
Reviews.Content: Got two iphones to replace mine and my husbad's, neither worked, hat to spend over 100 dollars with a technitian, and still not able to function properly.  Awfull product.  Couldn't return them, since we trew away the boxes...  Next time rather pay a couple of dollars more and buy directly from Apple!

Reviews.Title: 1 out of 2
Reviews.Author: Ana Paula
Reviews.Content: I ordered two I hopne front the same company, ones is just perfect and nice, but the other never charges... How come? I charched all night made one phone call in the morning then the baterry was dead!!What can I do? I don't know where to call or if the will refund or send another I phone!! Can someone give an ideal?If was for the that I would give a five star!

Reviews.Title: unlocked Crappy IPHONE
Reviews.Author: Michael Keller
Reviews.Content: Save yourself the time and money by not buying an Apple IPHONE. One real good reason is ITUNES wants to update all the time, you can not put music on your phone. You have to buy music from ITUNE. Updates to my phone eventually locked it up to the point of no more worky. Could not get on the internet without going to Apple's website and downloading a file for the phone to work with my phone carrier. Touchscreen no adjustment. volume control lousy, not at all pleased with Apple at all. I have had Nokia, LG, and Samsung phones and have been pleased with them Thought I would try a IPHONE. What a joke. They want you to pay for everything. I am used to a sd dick plugged into the phone to play music. Not with Apple. So just save yourself the time and trouble of not buying any Apple IPHONES.

Reviews.Title: Could be better.
Reviews.Author: Mic Silviu Lucian
Reviews.Content: Don't be fooled by the title that says UNLOCKED. The phone is LOCKED! period. And it is written in the product description. I realized that only after few hot exchange of emails with GagetWorld to explain to me why is the phone LOCKED when the title clearly states "Apple iPhone 3G 8GB-Unlocked". It was my fault because I didn't read the product description, and it was they'r fault that the title said UNLOCKED and it actually isn't, now I need to unlock the phone by myself. Still the phone looks like new.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: I love my new phone easy to use and it came with accessories I would recommend this seller to anyone .

Reviews.Title: WARNING!!!!
Reviews.Author: martha
Reviews.Content: I will NEVER EVER EVER recommend this cell phone it last only 3 days the home button never work after 3 days and after 5 days later the top button pop out, break easily but beside that the costumer service was really good seller make a return and my money back.

Reviews.Title: Very nice phone just outdated.
Reviews.Author: Sherman B Bishop
Reviews.Content: Unit was outdated so would not meet the 4G network. Very nice phone good features but couldn't make it work.

Reviews.Title: Great gift.
Reviews.Author: ray chewning
Reviews.Content: Got this for my grand daughter , she really does like it , she started using it imediatly , Thank you .

Reviews.Title: THIS WAS FAKE, AND REFURBESHED
Reviews.Author: david w. vensel
Reviews.Content: I HAD IT CHECKED OUT, AND I WAS PISSED OFF, SOMEONE OUT OF THERE GARAGE PROBLY SOLD THIS CRAP TO ME AND I WAS ANGRY OVER THE ORDER,  ALSO, THIS PHONE WILL NOT SUPPORT ANY UPDATES SO YOU CANT DOWNLOAD ANYTHING ON IT, NOTHING, NOT EVEN MUSIC,  DONT BUY IT !!!!!!  BEWARE,

Reviews.Title: Good Merchandise
Reviews.Author: Hussein Ali Nwayyir
Reviews.Content: I had the following notes ..1. The delivery was as I expected ... No delay2. The item as described new .. Except that the outer cover was for iPhone 3GS and not for 3G and this made no difference ..3. The phone was unlocked as described and working on our local networks in Iraq ... Firstly I had a problem with that but the seller was so helpful and help me to resolve that problem as he send me emails and call me day and night to solve that ... I recommend this merchandise as I did not leave you back and he try to help you with your purchase ...4. It is so useful to find an iPhone with that price and newness despite apple stoping his production a couple of years ago ..

Reviews.Title: No apps for you!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "sci-fi fan"
Reviews.Content: Seriously, you won't be able to download any apps. ITunes no longer supports this phone. Also, about two weeks in the screen cracked. Biggest piece of crap I ever had the misfortune of spending money on.

Reviews.Title: A used phone sold as new according to Apple Assistance Store
Reviews.Author: Wesley Fernandes
Reviews.Content: The phone has been given back to the store and I have been refunded. The service assistance from the store needs some improvement on the treatment with customer but the problem was solved in the end.

Reviews.Title: Great buy for the Money
Reviews.Author: Julialynn psychic
Reviews.Content: When faced with the prospect of buying an I Phone for my son I was not going to spend upwards of $400 so I bought this and am I glad I did. It works perfectly and looked new on arrival. Its great and my son is in vogue with all of his friends now.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Poor service
Reviews.Author: Uchenweze
Reviews.Content: I got two out of three I requested despite my appeal to get this sorted,no one has ever repliedI believe it must have been from one of the sellers and it is a big problem because. One cannot track the items

Reviews.Title: NO
Reviews.Author: TyLK
Reviews.Content: Do NOT buy this phone. Just don't. The phone is slow and there are not many apps that can be used on this outdated phone. Also, my phone got stuck on the apple logo start-up screen after a few months of use because of the jailbreak. This phone was horrible. Do not waste your money!

Reviews.Title: Shame on the seller.
Reviews.Author: dechen dorjee
Reviews.Content: I am so pissed of when I operate the phone, and came to notice that it is not working at all. I returned the product.

Reviews.Title: DEFECTIVE
Reviews.Author: Vera Torigami
Reviews.Content: I purchased two Iphone 3Gs from CELLSMAN and less than a month after they both no longer work. I bought them during my vacation in Miami in late October, now I'm in Brazil.  Lost over $400.

Reviews.Title: Dissapointed
Reviews.Author: Janine Reyes
Reviews.Content: Item works for now, but was not advised of crack screen, have yet to try it with a sim card, plug and cable were useless. BTW it is NOT UNLOCKED!!

Reviews.Title: liked it But....
Reviews.Author: sparkle90
Reviews.Content: This phone was BOMB at first then things started to go down hill, the phone wouldn't stay unlocked IDK why? it gave me such a problem I decided to pawn it and get a non-iPhone. That experience turned me off from iPhones forever plus everyone and there mommas have a iPhone and that in it self turned me off I don't want to be like everyone else and if that means not spending hundreds of bucks and saving hundreds of bucks on a phone than so be it :)

Reviews.Title: Ummm WTF
Reviews.Author: lesfor best
Reviews.Content: Ummm , yea this product was not what i was expecting at all. I returned it and they never gave me my refund so idk wtf amazon got going on but .... im considering deleting my account with them. shrugsss ... i wouldnt suggest it for anyone. And the seller does not give enough info about the products.

Reviews.Title: it is LOCKED
Reviews.Author: Sarah .M
Reviews.Content: the  phone  in a good  condition  but  it is LOCKED! really ! this is misleading so i have to unlocked which i have to pay 50 dollar i sent the seller a message and he did not replay yet if you looking for  unlocked phone do not but from this sellar but if you are looking for a locked phone this phone is great.

Reviews.Title: a complete lie
Reviews.Author: Roger
Reviews.Content: they said this iophone is unlocked which is very frustrating to me, and i tried asking for a refund and they lied to me and confessed the lie, told me that it wasnt their problem, and then blocked me.

Reviews.Title: I should never have bought this phone!!!
Reviews.Author: Marc Najjar
Reviews.Content: I bought this iPhone as a gift in October of 2011, it was shipped on time and eventhough it is a very old model of the iphone, i bought it new.The person that received this gift did not tell me at first but i found out later on that it gave him so much trouble that he stopped using it after 3 months time.He later told me that the screen stopped responding at first, then there was no sound, then it would not turn on. He sent it to an Apple specialist to fix it, but they told him that it would cost more than what the phone is actually worth. so he abandoned this route.The reason i am writing this review today is to warn people who might be thinking of buying an old model iphone, most probably those are refurbished because they had a manufacturing problem.I bought this phone as brand new from the seller and it did not work, had i known earlier i would have returned it and got my money back. BEWARE!!!!

Reviews.Title: Not What I expected
Reviews.Author: Clarissa L. Williams
Reviews.Content: This was my first time purchasing an unlocked phone and an iphone, so I don't have anything to compare to. From the time I put in the sim card to try the phone out I immediately knew I didn't like the phone. I am not tech savy in regards to cell phones so I don't know all of the terminology but my previous phone which I loved was a HTC EVO and way superior in my opinion. I don't know if it's just the unlocked phone that was lacking but the phone is completely not worth it. I will be purchasing another droid ASAP... I basically wasted my $$ on this phone. The apps run super slow (if they work at all), forget about gps could NEVER get a signal, browsing is super slow, not as sleek in design as I would expect of an iphone, this phone is basically worthless to me.

Reviews.Title: Phone went dead after a month
Reviews.Author: Ziad Heikal "Ziad"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone a month ago and one day it turn off automatically and when I reset it the phone was on vibrate and the speakers went dead. I complained when I purchase it that this phone was not 100% new as thd screen was not really shiny and the lock button on thd top was kind off press down and not fully functional.I complained to Ross cellular where I bought the phone from and they told me to delete my comment and they will refund 30$ to my credit card.I did not have a choice but to accept this offer as returning it on my cost would cost me 100$ from Amsterdam, the Netherlands. Very very disappointed and will never buy online from amazon again or other sellers listed on amazon.

Reviews.Title: The 3G is still plenty of phone for most needs
Reviews.Author: iman777 "iman777"
Reviews.Content: I made the switch from an older Windows phone; I have never cared much for Apple.  I was quite pleased with what a got - a very versatile and useful phone that is really much more than a just a phone.  It is plenty powerful for me, since I don't do a lot of heavy surfing or downloads (and couldn't care less about Siri).  Being around my friends with 4S models does nothing to convince me that this phone is not still a very viable and MUCH less expensive way to get what you need in an iPhone.

Reviews.Title: Nice condition - Iphone
Reviews.Author: mom2tg
Reviews.Content: So, the transaction was smooth and the shipment on time.The Iphone was working properly and apparently not damaged. A few scratches around the corners but not a big deal. However, as I expected, the battery is not in a good condition. I have to recharge it everyday, sometimes twice a day.The iphone also came with the jailbroken software.Other than that, the phone is working great. Good product overall.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: Devin Lee
Reviews.Content: Very Pleased with this purchase!!!  The iPhone was new and perfect in the box!  I had to do a bit of troubleshooting aka put a small piece of tape on the back of my sim card to keep with from jiggling around in the phone, put in a hack to be able to send pictures, but I think these are issues that come with every unlocked tmobile iphone.  Thanks so much!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great phone for those living abroad.
Reviews.Author: M. Shelton "bajagal"
Reviews.Content: You buy a SIM card and you can use this phone in Mexico and Europe, and you can't beat the price.  Brand new phone with all the iPhone features.

Reviews.Title: Not a very good buy at all. In fact, a waste of money.
Reviews.Author: norcalgirl
Reviews.Content: Ok first of all, not only is it missing a volume button, the home button barely works. It's OS is so old that the whole phone barely works. In fact the on/off button on the top of the phone doesn't work at all either.I'm sorry I bought this phone.

Reviews.Title: I GOT IT USED AND IT DROPS CALLS ALOT
Reviews.Author: don g
Reviews.Content: THE SCREEN WASNT REPLACED PROPERLY AND IT GOES IN AND OUT IF I TOUCH IT TO HARD. NEEDS MORE WORK

Reviews.Title: Works good except for very bottom of screen.
Reviews.Author: L. Heider
Reviews.Content: The very bottom of the screen has an area about 1/16" that has lines through it and makes the words unreadable in the area.  Other than that, it works as expected.  I live in Haiti so it is very difficult to return it.  I bought it to use as a replacement for my Digicel phone and make it possible to use the map ap so I can figure out where I am at in Port-au-Prince as I drive around.  It appears it will work for that.

Reviews.Title: Too outdated.
Reviews.Author: brandon jones
Reviews.Content: This phone was too old to update (limiting app options significantly), painfully slow on the internet, and crashed from time to time. I think it's a bit too outdated to use these days.

Reviews.Title: Unlock Slide Mecahnism Frozen
Reviews.Author: M. Ramahi "Ramahi"
Reviews.Content: So, the unlock didn't work and I took it to Apple store to fix it. when Apple technician opened the phone to fix the issue they informed me that they can't because the phone ISN'T an APPLE iPhone. The shell said Apple iPhone but not under the hood. When I purchased the phone it did say Apple. I would like a refund on the phone!

Reviews.Title: Apple iPhone 3G
Reviews.Author: L A Greene "Emotional Healer, Author"
Reviews.Content: I dropped my Apple iPhone 3G and the glass shattered. I bought this one to replace it, but I could not get it to work so I returned it.

Reviews.Title: chip on screen - on off button missing
Reviews.Author: joean takahashi
Reviews.Content: arrived nicely package with an ugly phone inside it was scratched - chipped and missing on/off button.  very very disappointing

Reviews.Title: Disappointed with lack of recent apps
Reviews.Author: sandi
Reviews.Content: I am disappointed that Apple no longer makes apps for this phone and so the most recent features are unavailable

Reviews.Title: Phone didn't work
Reviews.Author: Jason Witherspoon
Reviews.Content: The phone did not turn on or charge. I couldn't use it from the very first day I received it.

Reviews.Title: You better buy newer versions
Reviews.Author: White Eagle
Reviews.Content: The screen became inactive after less than 3 weeks. It is now useless. When I bought a used phone, I hoped to have it work for at least a year. I was wrong.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Esther Tolliver
Reviews.Content: Love it! The phone arrived when promised and was in new condition as promised with new charger and ear phones. It is a starter Ipone and perfect for when we give it to one of our sons.

Reviews.Title: Iphone
Reviews.Author: Dale Rozell
Reviews.Content: The phone is in the condition as described by the seller. The volume is not as loud as we wish it was. Our old phone had better volume, but that is not the seller's fault. The phone works fine.

Reviews.Title: My Apple iPhone 3G isn't working
Reviews.Author: valerie hansen
Reviews.Content: Delighted that I had been able to buy an iPhone at a good rate, I took the opportunity to give it as a present to my husband. But it doesn't work as expected. Doesn't connect to internet, doesn't allow me to download stuff - because of internet - and he now has mobile phone device that can pick phone calls and not much else.How can I return it and get my cash back?

Reviews.Title: first I-phone ever made
Reviews.Author: mary b
Reviews.Content: I was really underwhelmed. I was excited to try the I-phone after being a droid user.it doesn't send picture messages, and it is VERY slow in loading anything. I'm a hairstylist that often books clients using an online booking system. It is completely incompatible with the site which is super frustrating. If I had to say something nice about it I would say it came within a reasonable time.

Reviews.Title: Lousy product.
Reviews.Author: alex
Reviews.Content: Phone was received on time but did not function right it freezes most of the time and the charge did not work and when I contacted the company they told me to sent it back less 20% restocking fee. But I told them I should not be charged because they sent me a malfunctioning product and I complained to Amazon then they came back to me and said that phone did not have their inventory sticker. I had to talk to their customer service and they agreed on the full refund but they still insist on not recognizing the inventory sticker and that got me mad and felt indirectly accusing me in wrong doing so I demand to talk to the owner which was very nice and apologetic, she promised things like this will never happen again in the future. It was such a bad experience and waist of time and lack of professionalism from their part. I would not recommend buying product from PUT Group USA.

Reviews.Title: Phone ISSUE
Reviews.Author: Wisniewski
Reviews.Content: After I got this used phone it was full but then next day or so when battery was low I decided to plug it in and Battery decided that it was not going to work with charger so it died automatically‎ and it was no use to try to fix it so I send to company for trade in for my money because of this was piece shit after day or so and then I decided from now on I will no longer buy use phone that is going to be without battery charger or died and do not want to work anymore................

Reviews.Title: weak
Reviews.Author: Vincent Evans
Reviews.Content: it stop working and always show a white screen when i try to turn it on and u cant restore it

Reviews.Title: Refurbished phone sold as new by Cellular  Kingdome
Reviews.Author: Sylviahh
Reviews.Content: Purchased on aug 6, so happy that i purchased a second one that was delivered on Sept 24 for my husband.  Coincidentally my phone screen stops working on sept 24 (only 6 weeks after delivery) so I took the phone to the tmobile store, they recommend going to The Apple store which I did.  On Sept 26, Apple Store technician says the phone is refurbished, that "unauthorized modifications have been made to phone:  liquid damage sensor is missing, missing screw, SIM card tray has been replaced with no serial number ".  So I asked them to looked at the phone delivered on September 24 " Display is disconnected internally, tag that says do not remove this screw - screw was removed and replaced incorrectly, this phone won't even turn on".  Very disappointed, I was under the impression I  paid 125-130 dollars for NEW phones, that is why I paid so much for this IPHONE 3 from Cellular Kingdome. Fraudulent to be selling a product as new when it is NOT.

Reviews.Title: APPLE IPHONE 3G WITH A DEFECTIVE BATTERY!
Reviews.Author: osasogie akporotu
Reviews.Content: I did not like the phone because the battery was very bad..I could not even charge the battery for usage.

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: betty visher
Reviews.Content: The phone would have been just what I expected if it worked. It would not charge, I had to send it back a day after I got it.

Reviews.Title: VERY GOOD
Reviews.Author: Aida
Reviews.Content: THIS IPHONE IS AMAZING. VERY GOOD PHONE, THE ONLY PROBLEM IS NOT EASY TO ACTUALIZED THIS IPHONE, YOU MUST SALE THE SOFTWARE

Reviews.Title: This was supposed to be a new product but no it wasn't
Reviews.Author: Michael Duny
Reviews.Content: The phone out of the box looked ok but the battery does not last. Thought this was supposed to be a new product like the add said. Disappointed

Reviews.Title: Good price
Reviews.Author: Omar gastelum
Reviews.Content: it is a pretty good shape phone! I am happy! I look foward to buy One more iphone or samsut s3

Reviews.Title: Great Phone and Great Seller
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I ordered this Iphone as factory unlocked..it is only unlocked...the phone almost constanly rebooted itself, when I tried  to use the wi-fi and if I tried to use a bluetooth connection. This phone now has a bigger problembecause I tried to update it on Itunes and it erased everything and is now stuck in recovery mode with a firmware error..its useless to me now...I will have to bring it to apple who will hopefully be able to restore it..if not then I dont know what to do. An UPDATE TO THIS ORDER..I contacted the seller and he gracefully refunded my money...CellularKingdome is a WODERFUL AMAZON SELLER...I will alwayslook to see if CellularKingdome is selling items because they are fair and reasonable and above all HONEST...THANKS AMAZON for having such honest great sellers.

Reviews.Title: This Used iPhone Fits The Need
Reviews.Author: Philip K. Buchanan
Reviews.Content: I needed a moderately priced unlocked smart phone that would fully pare with my car's bluetooth system. I tried a couple other brands that only partly worked. I found this reconditioned iPhone 3G in the Amazon store. It came with a 15 day return guarantee if I found it wasn't as described. It arrived within a couple of days and was in even better physical condition than described. Right out of the box it pared with the car's system giving me complete voice control over placing/answering calls and using the phone's contacts list. I've also loaded a few apps and music into the device. They, too, work fine. If one doesn't need the latest whistles and bells, I'd recommend this reconditioned iPhone.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying  my i phone 3G
Reviews.Author: moses11
Reviews.Content: Met all expectations, no problems noted, having a great time with my iphone,  no regrets. Will continue to purchase this product in the future.

Reviews.Title: iPhone 3G from Cali-wholesale
Reviews.Author: Big B
Reviews.Content: I bought the iPhone 3G from Cali-wholesale mostly because they offered it fulfilled by Amazon. I knew if I had any trouble, I would be dealing with Amazon for the return.The iPhone 3G arrived in excellent condition. It is a used unit, but there were very few scratches on it and I was pleased with the condition. The iPhone was truly unlocked and not just jailbroken. I was able to update to the latest IOS available for the 3g (4.2.1) and use my T-Mobile sim card.I give it 5 stars from Cali-Wholesale. The only drawback, of course, is not Cali-Wholesale's fault. There are currently very few apps available anymore for IOS 4.2.1. This is disappointing, and something that might steer one toward Android if you would like an inexpensive smartphone with a large app selection, but I had intended to just enjoy the phone/text interface. I easily shut off all cellular data (do a search on how to alter APN settings) and will use it for talk, text, and Wi-fi only.

Reviews.Title: i dont like it
Reviews.Author: Rene Kelly
Reviews.Content: I am not able to download any application such as whatsapp every app I try to download a app it is telling me that I nee isis 4·3 I don't like it

Reviews.Title: Business
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: the phone was ok. I could not update the phone but needed to for what I was trying to do. I run a business and need to be able to except credit and debit cards. I was not able to update with ios5 so the phone was no good to me. Just look good on my hip. Unfortunatly that wont make me any money. I was honest enough to send the phone back with everything that came with it and even made sure it look the same way it did when I opened the box. I have been wiating for over 3 weeks to get my money back and Amazon is telling be I might have to wait another two weeks. That's Just bad business! 150 buck your money and you have to wait almost two months to get it back? I don't know about you but have have a lot of places I could put 150.00 bucks. I still haven't got my money back. Amazon, you should treat your customers that way. No more ordering from Amazon for me.

Reviews.Title: it's not unlocked!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Sachiko Watabe
Reviews.Content: First, it's not  included sim card tray, so, i purchased it,and after I got it,Finally, inserted sim card(T-mobile)But, it shows "No Service"sim card is activated.the problem is this is not unlocked.what should I do......

Reviews.Title: customer service
Reviews.Author: S.Cov.
Reviews.Content: The phone was brand new, nothing wrong with it but I ordered the wrong phone and the customer service lady was so nice enough to help me and work with me... Good customer service...

Reviews.Title: Apple iPhone 3G 8GB - Unlocked
Reviews.Author: Martha R.
Reviews.Content: When I purchased my Apple IPhone 3G, I had a few issues with the phone but the seller has been really good about working with me to get these issues resolved. At this point, we are working as a team to correct the functionality of this phone.

Reviews.Title: not worth it
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: I bought this and used it for about 2 months and then the screen would go black and shut off by it's self. I wasn't even hard on it most of the time it was sitting on my table.

Reviews.Title: Item not received as described
Reviews.Author: C.C.
Reviews.Content: Upon receiving item, I immediately activated it but to find out it can only be used on speaker phone. The internal handset audio would not work. Had to return it to the seller

Reviews.Title: Wack
Reviews.Author: Angela Green
Reviews.Content: Wack, I had to send it back, It wasn't what i thought it would be. I paid $150 and no phone company wanted to activate because it was too old.

Reviews.Title: not work
Reviews.Author: MAHAGOUB
Reviews.Content: it is not work as iphone,its software is old and can not update,it look like locked phone no respone for update or down load

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Kevin R.
Reviews.Content: The apple iPhone 3G I purchase was  good, enjoy it, it was clean and all features work. The only concern is that it doesn't connects well with some networks.

Reviews.Title: Not Unlocked as discribed!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Randy D Andrews
Reviews.Content: I am in Afghanistan and the only iPhone that will work here is a 3g but it must be unlocked, add listed this as unlocked and it was also on the box when I received it, but it was not unlocked it still required an AT&T; sims card failing to recognize the local cards here.  Can't download an unlock program etc due to connection issues...so I ran it over with an MRAP because I can't return it from here. Nice job Amazon !!!!!

Reviews.Title: review
Reviews.Author: devon bryant
Reviews.Content: dont purchase i hated when i recieved the phone wasnt fully unlocked i wouldnt purchase the phone if i was you

Reviews.Title: would not buy again
Reviews.Author: Jaci Kuykendall
Reviews.Content: You can't download any apps it is horrible I would never buy this again would not recommend this company to anyone they would not respond back when I try to contact them.

Reviews.Title: no lo recibi
Reviews.Author: EVITA
Reviews.Content: lamentablemente la empresa por la cual estoy registradas para los envios a venezuela extravio el producto y no puedo dar ninguna referencia del mismo

Reviews.Title: I got what I ordered
Reviews.Author: mickey.cainn
Reviews.Content: Not a whole lot to say. I was kind of skeptical of ordering another "unlocked" phone here on amazon, due to the issues I encountered ordering a Droid 2 Global (which, by the way, wasn't unlocked and didn't have the right software on it). But, to my pleasant surprise, the Iphone was really unlocked. Everything was in the box and in great shape. It really looked brand new to me. It was ordered for a friend, so I don't have it, but I did give it a good "once over". This seller is the real deal. You can order a phone from here with confidence that you'll get what you pay for...

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Wilmer
Reviews.Content: This phone got here pretty quick and did come unlocked. I inserted my simple mobile sim card and it worked just fine. Only problem is that no earphones or instructions came.

Reviews.Title: Not is as great condition as I hoped
Reviews.Author: Rachel Huff
Reviews.Content: The front screen is slightly leaning forward off the phone, and the lock screen button hardly presses but it does work. I'm not 100% satisfied, but it's ok.

Reviews.Title: this was a rip off!!
Reviews.Author: bookworm03
Reviews.Content: unable to upgrade phone to get the latest apps..such a waste!! will be returning this back asap!! what a waste.

Reviews.Title: my iPhone
Reviews.Author: DOROTHYANN HALE
Reviews.Content: I love my phone and I have had no problems with it so far.it was just as it was advertised and arrived in a timley fashion.I  love Amazon.

I went to see if I could send it back I found that the serial numbers on the phone itself did not match the number on the box it came in. The headphones that came with the phone are  both left ear pieces and the remote control on them doesn't work. I don't believe this is a genunie Apple phone and I think I was sold an inferior knockoff. Since the return policy of the company was only good for 30 days and the phone didn't start acting up until after the 30 days had passed, I was out of luck. What recourse do I have with this expensive phone that now will not work at all??? Please advise. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: READ THIS:Word Of Warning from an IPhone User of 3.5 years!
Reviews.Author: Kris
Reviews.Content: Before You buy an IPhone 3G, OR 3GS;* Make sure you buy an extended warranty that will cover you for total replacement (eligible) up to, at LEAST 2 years, and here's why:I bought a brand new 3G in 2008---in 2009 I had a problem with the phone and took it to the Apple Store. They looked at the phone, claimed it had gotten wet since I had it( As if I'm a kid that would let my phone near a drop of water! I'm 50 years old!) and that the warranty was void...I bought a replacement that day because I needed the phone for my job...last year I bought a second 3GS for a family member's  Christmas present and both of these phones have CONSTANT issues with their speakers. The speaker problem on my phone  has become so bad over the past 3 months that No One can hear me AT ALL when I send or receive calls now.My IPhone is an IPod Touch now...the other iPhone is on it's way too- don't WASTE your money on the IPHONE unless you can afford to buy a new smartphone every year.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy - no warranty!
Reviews.Author: Alex Tafarrodi "crispy"
Reviews.Content: Hello,This was my very first Apple product and I assure you it will be my very last.I bought a supposedly NEW one on Amazon. The seller's name E&H; Electronics. www.amazon.com/shops/A1Y1K73KS093WJI was in hospital and then recovering for a while so did not open box until past the 30 days allowed for returns. Two days later, when I tried to reset to factory settings, the phone went completely dead. Still on but the screen completely black.I took it to an Apple store in Woodland Hills, CA. They looked up the history and said the "NEW" item I was sold was actually purchased by the seller in 2008. Apple would not provide any help and wanted $149 to fix it.What was most amazing was the Apple employee's attitude: arrogant and insolent. "It's your problem. You didn't buy this from us... Can't help you... You should've known."I wrote to Amazon and E&H; Electronics. Neither replied back.Here are supposedly titans of customer service - Apple and Amazon - and both performed no better than a street hustler.Amazon fronting for a fly-by-night seller who made no effort to warn me that YOUR PHONE IS BRAND-NEW BUT HAS NOT WARRANTY! - who could've predicted that? A phone that goes dead after 2 days of use. A total jackass 20-something Apple employee who had the audacity to blame me for all this. And a company (Apple) that knowingly dumps old phones to third-parties, of course knowing many buyers would get screwed.Corporate America has actually managed to change the meaning of "new". It now could mean new with zero expectation that it will work past 30 days.This paper-weight will remain in my possession as a reminder of the dishonesty and arrogance we have to tolerate everyday. And I look forward to kicking Steve's ass when I get to the other side.

There are literally only a handful of apps that run on this. Far less than I anticipated. No Facebook or Netflix. But she and I could live with it and you can still access Facebook over Safari. Basically if you're looking for a nice phone for talk, text, web, YouTube (built in app), weather, mapping destinations and a small handful of apps, plus photo taking and music playback, this phone is perfect. If you're expecting more, get a 3GS. Apple still supports that for the time being.UPDATEShortly after writing this the wifi quit working. It can no longer find a network. Have contacted the seller and am awaiting reply. I'm still fairly impressed with the phone. I don't blame the seller for the wifi crapping out, it is after all a 5 year old phone.

"NOT" The company in UK could not unlock it because I did not buy from themNext there was a card in the Box the phone came in saying if you Leave a postive feed back they will extend your warrenty 45 days (kind of like paying for a good feed back) after much searching (thanks to the card they left in box) I found out that Midstar cellular was the dist. of the phone got a hold of Paul Babichenko how said to e-mail them & they would unlock this phone that was 7 weeks ago I have left messages & no  one  has ever got back to me WOULD NOT BUY FROM THIS COMPANY UNLESS YOU KNOW HOW TO HACK PHONES & NEVER WANT TO USE ITUNES. Apple said if you call them with a seral number they can tell you if the phone is new & unlocked correctly IF the seller will not give you the seral number then it is not real unlocked phone

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT SERVICE FROM CALI WHOLESALE
Reviews.Author: Brian E. Gooch
Reviews.Content: Ordered used, unlocked iPhone from Cali Wholesale.  Arrived w/o sim card tray.  Spoke w/ Josh at Cali Wholesale.  He offered to send one, or reimburse me if i purchased one locally.  For personal reasons i chose to purchase it.  Within two days phone stopped working (possibly my fault).  Spoke to Josh again.  He offered to reimburse my money or ship replacement phone over night since i was going out of the country on business.  Replacement phone arrived the day i was to leave and has been working flawlessly ever since (60+ days).  Money for sim card tray was reimbursed, too.  Josh/Cali Wholesale was great. Highly recommend him/them.  BTW, my computer guy was surprised to learn that my phone was 'used' since it looked so pristine.  Thx Josh.Apple iPhone 3G 8GB - Unlocked

Reviews.Title: super  disappointed

When I received my iPhone in the mail (which was sent very quickly) I was very disappointed to find that it was an original iPhone. The phone was so old that I couldn't receive any iMessages, so anyone who sent a text via iPhone I didn't get the message. I had the phone for a total of 7 days before it stopped taking a charge and died for good. It was total bullshit and a sad day for me. I now have been using a $20 flip phone until they release the new iPhone on Wednesday!

Reviews.Title: Great phone, bad battery life!
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: Really liked this phone, liked the layout, how user friendly it is. I was worried about not liking the touch screen, but after using it I loved it!!! The only thing that we did not like is how long the battery didn't last and not being able to download apps. Just using the phone for a couple of phone calls and some texting the battery would not last a 8 hour work day without needing to be charged. When the battery got down to 20% the phone would shut off. The issue with not being able to download apps is not a huge problem, but having a Smart Phone one upside is being able to have apps... like angry birds!! Well we could not get them because the ios needed to be upgraded. I am not tech savy so I do not what this is or what it means, but really just some simple apps we could not get, (flashlight, weather). So for those two problems I give 3 stars. If you want a smart phone that is easy to use and has a touch screen this phone is good, but don't expect to be able to talk on the phone much because the battery will be dead in no time!

Reviews.Title: Interesting
Reviews.Author: M. Thomas
Reviews.Content: I think this is a buyer beware product on Amazon. The reason I say this is because I asked 3 questions that were erased (discussion removed) within a half hour: Is the phone brand new? How was the phone unlocked? and Can this phone be registered with Apple? So I would be a bit skeptical that you are getting a legitimately unlocked phone that is not refurbished. It will all depend on who the supplier is and that seems to change from moment to moment. Perhaps had I asked WHO unlocked the phone? since I wasn't looking for a "how to" but whether it was legally unlocked and would stay unlocked. I'm going to purchase something else.

Reviews.Title: January 2014 - Kids consider it an antique.  Wife loves it.
Reviews.Author: Unplugged "Unplugged"
Reviews.Content: It is only a bit bigger than a standard phone, but it still fits my wife's hand.  She is very happy that it is compatible with her iPad so she does not have to learn new trick and jump through additional hoops to use it. She is happy and so I am happy too.  On the other hand it is so sleek that I find it slippery to hold.  Buying a compatible case solved the problem but it is getting difficult to find an "old" case when everyone is heading toward the iPhone 5.  Making all these phone less "sexy" and more utilitarian should be the next priority.  The phone is ok but the battery needs to be charged daily!  More work on this might have been wise.  I guess that is how they can sell a new model every so often.  Cars were not sold that way.

Reviews.Title: Not impressed
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I am an Apple person all the way.  This is my first iPhone though.  I am deployed and need an unlocked cell phone, found this and thought I was getting a great deal because it came with the Otter Box, belt clip, and charger.  When I received the phone, the plastic part of the case that goes over the screen was rippled, which makes the touch screen a total pain and leaves the debate between fighting with it or taking it off and risking dropping it on the rocks and breaking the phone all together.  I have only had the phone about a month and have already noticed the battery life decline greatly.  It also does not like to register that it is charging.  Will have it plugged in for an hour or more and it will still show the battery in the red.  I have to turn it off and then back on in order to get an accurate battery reading.  Will have it fully charged before bed and it will die after my alarm goes off.  Not at all impressed.  I didn't figure I was getting a new phone, but I at least expected something that would work well for 6 months.
